snippet: Instead of using the black-and-white quick-response code, House Beautiful ads will feature an orange circle with an image of a mobile phone inside.
abstract: Instead of using the black-and-white quick-response code, House Beautiful ads will feature an orange circle with an image of a mobile phone inside.
lead_paragraph: For magazine readers who find those little black-and-white pixelated boxes, called QR codes, annoying or just unsightly, a new visual cue is on the way.

headline.main: In House Beautiful, a New Look for Digital Watermarks
